short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly fetch client data from your PMS when the phone rings. Save over one minute per call!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fetchit ¬Æ by Schultz Technology allows you to instantly fetch your client's data from your Patient Management Software (PMS) when a client calls! 

üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èNo more wasted time spent trying to correctly spell the client's name or gathering cursory information! Reduce call duration and improve the end-client's experience!

On average, most customers save more than a minute per call! end-client's are thrilled when you already know their pet's name and what they're calling about.

üìå FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Blue popup bubbles for known callers fetches their client record in your PMS
‚Ä¢ Red popup bubbles allow instant phone number copying for super quick data entry
‚Ä¢ Advanced reporting and analytics for metrics like 'calls per day', 'calls per hour', 'average call duration' etc.
‚Ä¢ A full call history that allows you to view and open the records of any previous callers, filtered by known and unknown callers
‚Ä¢ Over 9+ PMS integrated and supported!
‚Ä¢ Text-to-Pay features to send out a SMS with payment integrations!
‚Ä¢ Two-way SMS between any Veterinary technicians, representatives and end-clients (with full access & visibility for administrators)
‚Ä¢ Support for CoreDial, RingCentral and several other phone systems!
